cause.description:
I lost family members in my country , because of street gangs , Today the 22 of July 2007 ; i lost my cousin ...and i wish that we as a group could undestand that being part of a gang is not like T.V...cool...all that G-Unit shit ,...all that Macho testosterone .....all this killing for nothing ...POWER to get people to fear you.....If i do this is beause I'm tired about all this killing , all this kids that wish to have a save house to live in ....for all the women in this world being abuse and use by gang members ...for Freedom ,...for You and your Kids ...and Me ..... so we can STOP ...Crying cause we Sad and start Crying cause we are Happy .....I don't want the same thing to happen to your Families...We all deserve to be FREE..
1. WE MOST STOP THE KILLING ....AND START DOING SOMETHING ABOUT OUR PLANET!
2. WE MOST LEARN TO RESPECT OTHERS...AND LEARN TO HELP EACH OTHER
3. WE MOST LEARN TO SAY NO TO VIOLENCE...OF ANY TYPE.....
cause.mission: ELIMINATE VIOLENCE ALL OVER THE WORLD...SAVE LIFE'S OF INNOCENT PEOPLE ....SPECIALY KID'S ...AND LOVE ONE'S
cause.name: NO..TO GANGS...!
